p: Finally, we docked our isolated compound peshawaraquinone ( 1) into the binding site of 5C1M. Its superimposed binding pose with native morphinan is shown in Figure 3 a. The 3D interaction plot showed two hydrogen-bond interactions with Asp147 and Tyr326 via hydroxy groups. Tyr148 forms a bifurcated π–π interaction with the naphthalene-1,4-dione ring. Another bifurcated π–π interaction was observed between naphthalene-1,4-dione and Trp318 ( Figure 3 b). Met151 displayed π-sulfur interactions. The computed binding energy for the isolated compound was −8.8430 kcal/mol.
